WorkItem.Description:
When I optimize my gear, Optimizer doesn't get the best enchant for my weapon and the enchant that brings always up is the one i had when the character was loaded.
 
Steps to Reproduce:
01. Launch Rawr
02. Load a Mage equiped with a Staff, which is enchanted with "Greater Spellpower (Staff)."
03. Check in the item list a better combination of a dagger/sword and an off-hand (like Rigormortis and Scourgelord's Baton)
04. Tools > Optimize
05. Thoroughness to full (I don't know if it matters)
06. Click Optimize
07. Now as you can see the dagger/sword is still enchanted with "Greater Spellpower (Staff)", even if it doesn't gain anything from that.
 
Some Additional Steps:
08. Click Load Optimized Gear Setup
09. Set manually the enchant of the dagger/sword to "Mighty Spellpower" (or other enchant)
10. Tools > Optimize
11. Click Optimize
12. As you can see the Optimizer chooses again "Greater Spellpower (Staff)", which gives zero spellpower to a dagger or a sword, and the resulted score is lower to the previous one.
 
Additional Information:
Rawr 2.3.8 and 2.3.9
Windows 7
 
PS: The additional steps' purpose is only to ensure that Rawr is choosing an inferior enchantment.
     At the attached file you can see the end results of those twelve steps on my character.
     Also check the score before and after in the picture.

Comments.Message: Did you mark the other enchant as available (not just put it on)? Meaning you marked it with a green diamond per the information posted in the Documentation for the Optimizer.

pfffffff thank you a lot.
I can't believe I'm using rawr for so long and never changed the first menu in comparisons....
